title: Glenn Greenwald on Reality Winner Controversy and Asking Trump to Pardon Snowden
description:
Glenn Greenwald returns to the show to discuss a few media moments he was involved in recently, one regarding the Intercept and Reality Winner, the other an appearance he made on Tucker Carlson's show on FOX. Katie and Matt dive into the viral clip of Joe Biden playing a clip of 'Despacito' at a recent Hispanic Heritage Month event.

Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
